caller_intent: Ruth Mark is following up on the status of a blanket policy for three buildings and confirming payment terms, while seeking clarification on potential premium changes if the policy is approved.
resolution_steps: Anna confirms she is still investigating the blanket policy status and expects to provide an answer by the afternoon.
Anna verifies with Ruth that the payment is not due until February, as shown in the system.
Anna agrees to call Ruth back the next morning to provide further updates.
Anna mentions that approval of the blanket policy may increase Ruth's premium.
knowledge_required: Policy processing timelines for blanket coverage
Payment schedule rules for insurance policies
Impact of adding blanket coverage on premiums
summary: Ruth Mark follows up on a blanket policy for three buildings, confirming payment terms and seeking clarification on premium changes. Anna confirms the policy status is still under review, verifies the payment timeline, and schedules a follow-up call. The conversation highlights potential premium implications of approving the blanket coverage.
